rooms.description: A welcoming entrance hall with a North-facing main door adhering to Vastu principles.
An open-plan living area and kitchen with abundant natural light. The design facilitates social interaction and adheres to Vastu by orienting the space for positive energy flow.
A dining area integrated within the living space to maintain an open and connected environment.
A spacious master bedroom with attached en-suite bathroom for privacy, placed according to Vastu norms.
Additional bedroom, designed with sufficient natural light and ventilation.
Additional bedroom maintaining the overall farmhouse style with Vastu-aligned positioning.
A guest room with functional storage and comfortable seating area.

openings.description: The main entrance is North-facing as per Vastu guidelines.
East-facing windows to bring positive energy and light into the kitchen and living space.
A south-facing door for the master bedroom ensuring proper ventilation.

notes: This design is conceptual and adheres to local building norms in India. Further customization may be required based on site-specific conditions, local regulations, and detailed client requirements.
